root.name: Onechanbara: Bikini Zombie Slayers
root.description: OverviewOnechanbara Bikini Zombie Slayers is a hack-and-slash game putting you against hordes of zombies, monsters, and the occasional boss character. Although on the surface this title seems to largely involve waggling the Wii remote, it does differentiates between horizontal, vertical, and forward movement, which is specifically required to perform certain attacks.There are four different characters you can play as, each with their own playstyle. Saki for instance can sheath her sword and use melee and grapple attacks. Flicking the Wii Nunchuk will also cause her to sprint. Reiko can use a gun, which is controlled using the Wii remote's IR pointer. Although main attacks are performed using motion controls, buttons or dpad are also used for certain attacks. For example, Aya can throw knives using the dpad.Bikini Zombie Slayers also features split screen cooperative play.
